description: Records for sum of proper divisors function.
links: T. D. Noe and Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000 (first 372 terms from T. D. Noe)
mathematica: With[{list1=DeleteDuplicates[Array[DivisorSigma[1, #]-#&, 3000, 0]]}, list2 = {}; Table[If[list1[[n]]>Max[list2], AppendTo[list2, list1[[n]]]], {n, Length[ list1]}]; list2] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 30 2011 *)t = {0}; n = 1; mx = 0; While[Length[t] < 100, n++; s = DivisorSigma[1, n] - n; If[s > mx, mx = s; AppendTo[t, mx]]]; t (* _T. D. Noe_, Feb 23 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _J. Lowell_
